page.title: 13SAVERNAKE HOSPITAL_A HISTORY
page.content: { Savernake Hospital}was built in 1866. It was standing on a different site to where it is now.It was opened on 28th June 1866, when there were only six beds.By 1870 it had grown to 20 beds. On 6th July 1872 the hospital was moved to its present site.The hospital kept growing, more and more rooms were built. The hospital has had 17 Matrons since it opened.The one most remembered was Mrs Lavington.She gave her services free from 1919_1937.The hospital has had many donations from the League of Friends, and different charities. The hospital is growing all the time, more wards and day-rooms are being added and it is hoped that the old nurses' home will be converted into something useful.There is a great community spirit within the hospital.
